properties.areaDesc: Wabash, IL; White, IL; Posey, IN; Gallatin, IL; Gibson, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:22PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...Indiana...

Wabash River at New Harmony

.Heavy rainfall over the past 36 hours has caused water levels to rise
along the Wabash River at New Harmony. Low end moderate flooding is
forecast. Flood stage will be reached early Sunday morning while
moderate stage is forecast to be touched next Saturday night with
a crest near 20.0 feet.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Wabash River at New Harmony.
* from late tonight until further notice.
* At  7:30 PM Saturday the stage was 14.5 feet.
* Flood Stage is 15.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage after early Sunday morning and
continue to rise to near 20.0 feet by next Saturday night.
* Impact...At 20.0 Feet...Parts of northern New Harmony begin to flood
and sandbagging becomes necessary in town.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
